apis

Class InstagramSnooper

  • java.lang.Object
    • apis.InstagramSnooper

  • public class InstagramSnooper
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Luke Bassett The InstagramSnooper Class is the main class that handles Instagram data from its API. It handles getting user information and post information from specific access tokens.
